short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly start editing code from a Github repository. This extension adds a Web Editor button to each repo you visit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a "Web Editor" button to all viewable Github repositories. Once you press this button, you will immediately be taken to an online code editor where you can start making changes to the code in the repository.
